item.title: Porsche’s insanely clever hybrid engine comes to the 911 Turbo S
item.description: The new 911 variant is 14 seconds quicker around the Nürburgring Nordschleife.

item.title: Porsche’s best daily driver 911? The 2025 Carrera GTS T-Hybrid review.
item.description: An electric turbocharger means almost instant throttle response from the T-Hybrid.
